verbose_text: Mechanical pressure injury (10 Mpa, 60 min) rapidly induced miR-146a and VEGF expression and inhibited Smad4 expression in human chondrocytes, and their expression gradually increased and decreased, respectively over a 48-h time course following the exposure of the chondrocytes to mechanical pressure (XREF_FIG), which was consistent with the microarray results (data not shown).
